scripts.start:development: NODE_ENV=development npx nodemon app.js -r dotenv/config dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.start:production: NODE_ENV=production npx nodemon app.js -r dotenv/config dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.start:test: NODE_ENV=test npx nodemon app.js -r dotenv/config dotenv_config_path=.env.test
